title: [Sony] KAIST job fair and online engineer talk sessions
author: 글로벌리더십센터 최여진
content:
Greetings
from Japan！
We offer
40+ full-time and internship roles for STEM students & graduates who
can join
in 2025!
 40+
full-time and internship opportunities are listed below.
Application
Link: https://sonyglobal.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/SonyJapanCareers
 Application
Deadline: Sunday, September 15th, 2024 @ 23:59 (JST)
*Applications
will be continually processed up to the deadline, and positions will close
afterward if filled.
 ●On Campus Event
Sony
will participate in Job Fair at KAIST!
Please
visit our booth !
Date
& Time: 2024. 09. 02. (Mon) 10:00~17:00
Venue :학술문화관(E9) 5층 @ KAIST
 ●Online Event
Please also
register for one of our upcoming Zoom sessions to learn more about Sony, and to
hear directly from our researchers/engineers about their work at Sony in Japan.
*All
times are Japan Standard Time, so please convert to your local time zone as
necessary.
 Session
#1
Date
& Time: Tuesday, September 3rd from
10:00 AM – 11:00 AM (JST)
Registration
Link: https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_kgPxihEMQ7mtt2luDYN01w
 Session
#2
Date
& Time: Thursday, September 5th from
6:00 PM – 7:00 PM (JST)
Registration
Link: https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_vKhgQc32Tmyl2fD5tMCRIQ
 All
listings are open to STEM students primarily from Computer Science and/or
Engineering backgrounds including, but not limited to, AI (ML), Software
Engineering, Speech Synthesis/Recognition, NLP, Security, Electrical
Engineering, Robotics, Computational Photography, Computer Vision, Computer
Graphics, Data Analysis, and more!
 ALL
positions will be based in Japan (in or around Tokyo). Interviews will be
conducted in English, and 95% of roles do NOT have Japanese language skill
requirements (however, interest in Japanese culture is always a plus!).
 Finally,
as part of our onboarding process, we provide full financial and logistical
support for obtaining visas and relocating to Japan for both full-time
employees and interns.
 We very
much look forward to connecting with you as you think about your short-term and
long-term career vision!
 All the
best,
 Talent
Acquisition Department
Sony
Group Corporation
